name: Super Zipper Man
description:
This is a simple but yet complicated runner game in which you run jump over obstacles and solve mind puzzles. If you have any suggestions or problems please write them in the comments!!!!

!!!DISCLAIMER!!! THIS GAME IS STILL IN ALPHA, SO IT MIGHT HAVE BUGS.

!!IMPORTANT!! WHEN YOU LEAVE TO THE MAIN MENU FROM THE PAUSE MENU AND PRESS PLAY OR CONTINUE, THE SCREEN WILL GO BLACK, TO FIX THAT PRESS "escape" AND IT SHOUD VANISH. I HAVE NO IDEA FOR WHAT THE CAUSE TO THIA ISSUE IS BUT I AM WORKING ON IT.
